page.title: 10Pit Jobs (Underground)
page.content: There are many jobs that are done underground at any colliery: 1.{FACEWORKERS}work at the face cutting the coal.About 20 work here. 2.{FITTERS}maintain all the machinery underground.{ 3.{ELECTRICIANS}they maintain all the electrical parts underground. 4.{HAULAGE}workers take all the material, to the top from the bottom. 5.{PADDY DRIVERS}drive the trains that take the men to work on the face. 6.{ROPE MEN}maintain the haulage ropes underground.{ 7.{BELT MEN}maintain all the belts that carry coal to the pit bottom. 8.{ONSETTERS}rap singles to the winder for the cage to leave the pit bottom. 9.{GENERAL WORKERS}move from one job to another where help is needed.
